Name: Crimson Snow
About the game: You were going to celebrate this holiday with your girlfriend, Joyce, but a pleasant evening was interrupted by an uninvited guest, and now you have to do your best to survive this Christmas. Crimson Snow is a story-driven horror game about the dark events of one Christmas night. Make your way through the strange house lighted with Christmas decorations and hide from the otherworldly stalker obsessed with you. Your girlfriend, Joyce, will help you escape or… she will become another victim herself — your fate depends on your words and decisions. What awaits you: Christmas night became the night of horror. Experience the mix of festive atmosphere and paranormal nightmare. Watch what you say and do. Your life and the life of your girlfriend depends on it. The secrets of your past will not leave you alone. Unlock them or they’ll destroy you.
